markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Barreling Charge](/Feats.aspx?ID=1605) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 108 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

</column>

---

You rush forward, moving enemies aside to reach your foe. You Stride, attempting to move through your enemies' spaces and make a melee Strike. Roll an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check and compare the result to the Fortitude DC of each creature whose space you attempt to move through during your Stride, moving through its space on a success but ending your movement before entering its space on a failure. You can use Barreling Charge to [Burrow](/Actions.aspx?ID=93), [Climb](/Actions.aspx?ID=33), [Fly](/Actions.aspx?ID=94), or [Swim](/Actions.aspx?ID=39) instead of Stride, as long as you have the corresponding movement type.

<title level="2">Barreling Charge leads to...</title>
[Overpowering Charge](/Feats.aspx?ID=1619)
name: Barreling Charge
